about_the_game:
The Story:

In this cozy and emotionally driven rhythm game, you’re in purgatory. The waiting room for the afterlife…and your very own therapy office. All of your clients have a story. Some are good, some are bad, but all of them are packed with emotion. It’s up to you to use the power of music to help these lost souls move forward!

Perhaps you’ll find out more about yourself, too, like why you’re here and who you were before. Were you cool? Did you have cool friends? Did you learn any words to describe something you like other than cool? Only time will tell…

In any case, your clients come first. Won’t you turn on the radio and lend them a listening ear?

The Gameplay:

To help your clients, you’ll have to play some music on your trusty jukebox! Point, click, and hold the left mouse button to play the right notes. During the song, it might be a good idea to listen to your clients. You wouldn’t want to play a happy song if they’re depressed, or vice versa. By choosing the right emotional beats, you can get their true feelings out.

When the session is over and a client moves on, they’ll leave a book behind on your bookshelf, allowing you to learn more about who they were.

Features:

  • Several songs from a dedicated audio team!

  • A colorful cast of clients to help with different backgrounds!

  • A soothing calm environment to relax to! 

  • Immersive musical gameplay!

  • Reading!

  • And more!!!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mojave 10.14+
  • Processor: Apple Silicon, x64 architecture with SSE2
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound Card Capable of Audio

name: Ghost Jukebox

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10, and Windows 11
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound Card Capable of Audio
  • VR Support: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Ghost Jukebox puts the “boo” in boogie, having you play all sorts of music for your clients in this cozy rhythm game. Everyone has their own afterlife journey, and it’s up to you to help them complete it!
